item.title: Japanese keyboard setting when using Remote Desktop from Mac
item.description: Open Registory Editor HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE > SYSTEM > CurrentControlSet > Control > Keyboard > Layouts > 00000411 Change the LayoutFile from “KBDJPN.DLL” to “kbd106.dll” Reference https://hirogura.com/2023/02/14/post-61264/
